TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Provides expanded support for application startup.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
- There is no guarantee of the order in which the assembly-defined application start methods are called. As a result, each registered start method should be coded to run in isolation and should not depend on side effects from other registered start methods.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).

An empty parameter signature that has no return value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method referenced by the `methodName` parameter must be public and can be either an instance method or static method.
